DES External works to match existing
description: Variation of condition 1 of planning permission dated 27th March 2024 (RN:23/07891/FULL) for the Alterations to St George Street and Maddox Street elevations; extensions at fourth and fifth floor level to provide additional office (Use Class E) floorspace; creation of new landscaped external terrace at fifth floor level; and installation of mechanical plant at roof level. Namely, installation of louvres at 5th floor level to the north (lightwell) elevation to provide ventilation to enable the condenser units within the approved plant enclosure to operate. Use of zinc sheets as the roofing finish to the 5th floor mansard roof, amendments to the proposed lighting design to the west(front of St George Street) elevation.
